text:
Working in the Storm Explorer

All documents will start with a storm model in them, yours included. If you want you can delete it, or you can add model to it. If you share it, all the other participants can see it in the Model Gallery. Make new documents using the File menu and choosing Open, then New.

If you want a document to appear in the Forecast tab, you'll need to publish it. Publishing is a choice on the File menu. Your published documents will show up as thumbnails, just as they do in the Gallery.
